Key Match Events: David Warner scored 163 for man of the match honours
Shaheen Afridi was too greedy, and smoked one straight to Marnus Labuschagne on the square leg boundary
Hasan Ali is the latest Pakistan batter back in the sheds, caught behind off the bowling of Mitchell Starc
Adam Zampa has his second successive four-wicket hall, he's lured Mohammad Nawaz out of his crease
Rizwan is now gone! Is that all she wrote for Pakistan?
Iftikhar Ahmed has arrived at the crease with a licence to swing apparently
Marcus Stoinis is in the game once again, taking a good catch off Pat Cummins bowling to remove Saud Shakeel
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan won the toss and elected to bowl
Post-Match Reflections: David Warner has downplayed concerns he's carrying a groin injury
Mark Taylor believes Australia are 'finding their groove' after claiming their second win of the World Cup
Australia has a four-day break before the next match against the Netherlands
Miscellaneous Highlights: Australia has notched up their second successive win at the World Cup
Off the back of his five-wicket haul with the ball and having just belted Cummins for four, Shaheen Afridi was too greedy, and smoked one straight to Marnus Labuschagne on the square leg boundary
The required run rate is still not out of control for Pakistan, but another wicket or two for the Aussies will make it incredibly difficult
Others: Adam Zampa's perfect record of taking a wicket in each of the 22 World Cup matches he's played in remains intact
